entry.title: December Events & Challenges!
entry.content:
Snowball Evolution Draft (1v1 and 2v2): December 2 - 9

Beware the mighty Snowball Evolution, Or it'll move your troops without permission. ‚öîÔ∏è Challenge: December 6 - 9 üèÜ Reward: Banner decoration

Snowstorm (1v1 and 2v2): December 9 - 16

This icy wind is no mere breeze, Without some warmth, your troops will freeze. ‚öîÔ∏è Challenge: December 13 - 16 üèÜ Reward: Banner frame

It's Raining Gifts (1v1): December 16 - 23

Hallelujah! It's rain gifts aplenty! Santa's here, and he's bringing a cheer! Make sure to follow him closely. ‚öîÔ∏è Challenge: December 20 - 23 üèÜ Reward: Banner (decoration + frame)

Holiday Feast (1v1 and 2v2): December 23 - 30

We've set the table, and the feast is ready, Bring a fork, knife, and sword; things might get deadly! ‚öîÔ∏è Challenge: December 27 - 30 üèÜ Reward: Banner (decoration + frame)

Special Delivery (1v1 and 2v2): 30/12 - 6/01

Playing troops will charge up your ability, And when it's full, get ready for a special delivery! ‚öîÔ∏è Challenge: January 03 - 06 üèÜ Reward: Banner (decoration + frame)

The hardest and most skillful challenge is back! 3 losses and you're out. Win an exclusive Emote!

entry.title: Game Update - New Tower Troop: Royal Chef!
entry.content:
• New Tower Troop: Royal Chef

  • Pass Royale with improved Lucky Loop‚Äîstarting next season

  • More cosmetics in Lucky Drops

  • Baby Goblins are being removed

New Tower Troop: Royal Chef

The first-ever offensive Tower Troop is coming to Clash Royale!

  • Royal Chef is a Legendary Tower Troop and will be available starting on Arena 13.

  • Every 18 seconds, Royal Chef increases the Level of your highest HP Troop by 1! His ability takes longer,¬† up to 30 seconds, to activate when he‚Äôs attacking.

  • Royal Chef‚Äôs ability prioritizes Troops that have not yet been leveled up, and only affects Troops with at least 20% of their total HP remaining.

Pass Royale with improved Lucky Loop

Starting in the January season, earning Lucky Drops will be easier than ever:

  • Once you complete the Pass, your Crowns will earn you an extra Lucky Drop daily.

  • Depending on the season length, you can unlock between 28 and 35 Lucky Drops in total.

  • Lucky Drops will stack. If you finish your Pass on day 20, you‚Äôll have 20 Lucky Drops waiting to be earned.

  • Once you‚Äôve claimed all your available Lucky Drops, a timer will let you know when your next one is ready to unlock.

More cosmetics in Lucky Drops

Now you can unlock even more cosmetic rewards in your Lucky Drops!

Goodbye, Baby Goblins!

With the farewell of the Goblin Queen from the Arena, it is now time to say goodbye to Baby Goblins.

Don‚Äôt worry‚Äîyou will be compensated for any Gold and Elite Wild Cards used to level them up!

Changes and Bug Fixes

  • Removed 1 task and consolidated Crown rewards, so now you only have 4 tasks instead of 5.

  • You‚Äôll now get notified when you‚Äôre close to losing your Daily Task streak.

  • Improvements to Card Delivery Tutorials‚ÄîWe‚Äôve made some minor visual adjustments and backend improvements to enhance your experience and prepare for future updates.

  • The Deck Switcher is now available in the Event game modes.

  • A toggle in the Settings Menu was added to turn haptic on or off as you like.

  • Fixed Goblinstein‚Äôs Lightning Link ability and Electro Giant Zap Pack not having reduced damage on King Tower.

  • Fixed Knight Evolution occasionally taking 100% damage while chasing a troop after attacking.

  • Fixed Mirror showing a question mark for Elixir Cost.

  • Various fixes to Mega Knight Evolution.

  • Various fixes to Electro Dragon Evolution.

  • Various fixes to Giant Snowball Evolution.

  • Various fixes to Musketeer Evolution.

  • Fixed various crashes.

entry.title: CHEST KEY CHANGES
entry.content:
As we gear up for another exciting year of Clash Royale, we want to take a peek at some changes coming to the Battle Rewards system.

Chest Keys Are Going Away

Starting in early January, Chest Keys won't be among the rewards in Diamond Pass Royale or Shop Offers. And by the end of March, we'll remove Chest Keys from the game altogether.

Rest assured, we're not just removing something ‚Äî we're making room for new features! The upcoming changes will let you play more games and earn rewards without having to worry about the Keys.

What Should You Do?

Don't let those Chest Keys go to waste! If you've been holding onto them, now is the perfect time to unlock any chests you have queued up. Remember, any unused Chest Keys will disappear at the end of March!¬†

That's all we can reveal for now, but stay tuned ‚Äî we'll share more details early next year!

Happy Clashmas,

The Clash Royale Team

entry.title: January Balance Changes
entry.content:
New Year, New Balance Changes!

It's time to shake things up in the Arena! In this big wave, we're adjusting some overperforming and underwhelming cards and addressing several design issues and inconsistencies. THESE CHANGES ARE LIVE!

NERFS ‚¨áÔ∏è

Archer Queen

Cloaking Cape Cooldown 15s ‚Üí 17s (13%)

Previously, Archer Queen could use her ability twice during a single deployment‚Äîonce for defense and once for offense‚Äîmaking her way too powerful. With the new increased cooldown, we aim to limit her ability to just one use per deployment (in most cases), giving Archer Queen's opponents a fairer chance to deal with her.

Cannon Cart

Shield Hitpoints 892 ‚Üí 824 (-8%)

Hitpoints 820 ‚Üí 824 (0%)

The excessive Shield Hitpoints made Canon Cart too tough. The new reduced Shield's durability makes Cannon Cart more manageable without compromising its unique role as a damage-dealing mobile unit. Another reason for lowering Cannon Cart's Shield Hitpoints is to align them with the Hitpoints of its stationary form. Moving forward, any balance changes to Cannon Cart will focus on maintaining consistency between its 'Wheeled' and 'Wheel-Free' forms.

Fisherman

Slow Duration from Anchor 2.5s ‚Üí 1.5s (-40%)

This change aims to cut excess power from Fisherman while keeping most interactions consistent.

Goblinstein

Doctor Hitpoints 885 ‚Üí 721 (-19%)

Goblinstein has shifted the meta heavily toward Lightning and Rocket as the preferred spells, and we aim to restore spell diversity. So, Doctor can now be destroyed by Poison or combinations like Fireball + Zap.

Ram Rider

Hitpoints 1767 ‚Üí 1696 (-4%)

While we appreciate that the Charge Range buff has made Ram Rider and Prince much more viable in 2024, Ram Rider reaches towers too effortlessly, albeit often with very low Health. We're reducing the Ram Rider's Hitpoints to make her easier to counter.

Spear Goblins

First Hit Speed 3s ‚Üí 4s (33%)

We're partially reverting Spear Goblins' June buff as an indirect nerf to Goblin Gang and Goblin Giant.

Bomber Evolution

One attack cannot damage the same enemy twice

The Bomber Evolution's attack could hit a target twice from certain angles and distances. This interaction was unpredictable and often frustrating, particularly with Crown Towers. So, we're removing it to make the Bomber's behaviour more consistent and balanced.

Electro Dragon Evolution

Extra Chain Damage 192 ‚Üí 128 (-33%)

Electro Dragon Evolution was single-handedly destroying huge pushes, which was frustrating for decks that don't have specific counters like Lightning.

Goblin Barrel Evolution

Additional visual indicator on Decoy Barrel

The fact that both barrels were identical added too much randomness to the battle, which conflicted with the game's core design. This change aims to nerf the card while maintaining its viability as a dual-lane offensive tool.

Ice Spirit Evolution

Ice Blasts 3 times ‚Üí 2 times (-33%)

Ice Blast Damage 110 ‚Üí 163 (48%)

Skeletons Evolution

Skeletons on Deploy 4 ‚Üí 3 (-25%)

These Evolutions were too efficient on defense and too strong at shutting down huge pushes for only 1 Elixir.

P.E.K.K.A Evolution

Heal per death

Scales with the HP of the destroyed troop

Healing Values at Level 11

  • Small troops (<990 HP): 282 ‚Üí 142 (-50%)

  • Medium troops (991-1989 HP): 282 ‚Üí 282 (0%)

  • Large troops (>1990 HP): 282 ‚Üí 565 (100%)

P.E.K.K.A Evolution now heals based on the maximum Health of the troop she destroys rather than a fixed amount. This rework decreases her ability to farm Hitpoints on smaller swarm troops, such as Skeletons or Goblin Gang, while maintaining her strength against big guys like Giant.

Royal Recruits Evolution

Charge Range 1.5 tiles ‚Üí 2 tiles (33%)

Charge Damage 273 ‚Üí 266 (-3%)

BUFFS ‚¨ÜÔ∏è

Dark Prince

Charge Range 3.5 tiles ‚Üí 3 tiles (-14%)

We're rebalancing Charge Ranges for Royal Recruits Evolution and Dark Prince, making the ranges consistent across the game. Troops that cost 5 or more Elixir will now have a 2-tile Charge Range, while those that cost 4 Elixir will have a 3-tile Charge Range.

Additionally, we're slightly reducing the Charge Damage for Royal Recruits Evolution to align it with other troops that deal double their regular damage as Charge Damage

Baby Dragon

Attack Splash Radius 1.2 tiles ‚Üí 1.5 tiles (25%)

Witch

Attack Splash Radius 1 tiles ‚Üí 1.5 tiles (50%)

For consistency, all troops, except for Skeleton Dragons, should have a Splash Radius of 1.5 tiles on their attacks.

Electro Giant

Added Sight Clipping

Electro Giant will now behave consistently with other building-targeting troops and not attack buildings that are too far away.

Goblin Demolisher

Lifetime after 50% HP 7s ‚Üí 8s (14%)

The last nerf to Goblin Demolisher was too severe and made it difficult to damage towers in his second form.

Goblin Machine

Damage 135 ‚Üí 212 (57%)

Hit Speed 0.9s ‚Üí 1.2s (33%)

Damage per Second 150 ‚Üí 176 (17%)

As Goblin Machine struggles in the current meta, we're reworking his melee attack to be slower and stronger. The Machine can now destroy Goblins in 1 attack.

Mighty Miner

Damage Increase Time 2.25s ‚Üí 2s (-11%)

Mighty Miner reaches his maximum damage faster, matching the speed of the Inferno Dragon and Inferno Tower.

Mini P.E.K.K.A

Damage 720 ‚Üí 754 (5%)

Mini P.E.K.K.A now packs a meaner punch and can once again destroy Wizard in one hit.¬†

Cannon Evolution

Barrage Damage 320 ‚Üí 353 (10%)

Cannon Evolution is less popular than other Evolutions, so we are increasing its Barrage damage to make it a more viable option.

Wall Breakers Evolution

Death Damage to Troops and Buildings 195 ‚Üí 292 (50%)

We're buffing Wall Breakers Evolution's ability to damage troops when their barrel is destroyed, making them harder to stop on offense and potentially more viable as a defensive tool.

Dagger Duchess

Projectile Speed 600 ‚Üí 1000 (66.67%)

We're increasing Duchess' dagger speed to buff her and resolve a rare bug that caused her to switch targets before destroying troops or buildings that take reduced damage.

Rework üîÑ

Lumberjack

Rage Duration 6s ‚Üí 5.5s (-8%)

Damage 242 ‚Üí 256 (6%)

To maintain consistency across the game, we‚Äôre reducing the duration of the Lumberjack's Rage effect to match the duration of the Rage spell. However, we‚Äôre also increasing his damage to offset the potential damage per second loss.

That‚Äôs all for now!

If you like these changes or feel there's still room for improvement, please let us know. We value your feedback and would love to hear from you!

See you in the Arena, The Clash Royale Team

entry.title: CHEST EXPERIMENT: KING TOWER LEVELS 1-9
entry.content:
With the latest maintenance, we've temporarily adjusted battle reward chests for players with King Tower Levels 1 to 9. As a part of this change:

  • Golden, Magical, and Giant Chests are removed from circulation. Wooden and Crown Chests are added.

  • Chest unlock times are updated:

    • Crown Chests now have a 24-hour unlock time.

    • Silver and Wooden Chests unlock instantly‚Äîno waiting required.

Note that the contents of each chest have been modified for the experiment, ensuring the total value of the rewards stays the same.¬†

Nothing changes for players who have already reached King Tower Level 10.¬†

Players who reach Level 10 during the experiment will go back to unlocking battle rewards chests the usual way.

The Reason Behind the Experiment

The chest slot system in Clash Royale has existed for as long as the game itself, and the expectations of new players joining the game today may differ from those at the time of the game's release. As such, this experiment will help us understand how changes to the chest unlock mechanics impact the overall experience. We'll use these learnings to guide future adjustments to the game's reward systems.

Please note that this is an experiment, and everything may still change. Therefore, it's crucial that you share your feedback on social media, Reddit or Discord!

entry.title: Balance Change & Optional Update!
entry.content:
In our latest maintenance, we changed how Rune Giant interacts with other Troops.

Rune Giant‚Äôs enchantments will now persist on Troops even after she is destroyed.

Rune Giant was designed to protect the Troops she enchanted, but she was often defeated before her enchantments could provide any significant value. This change strengthens her role and enhances her overall effectiveness in battle.

Additionally, Optional Update 9.198.22 was released, solving the following issues:

‚úÖ Added option to convert Season Shop‚Äôs Evolution Shards into Elite Wild Cards if your inventory is full;

‚úÖ Various crashes and small corrections.

Make sure to update your game for a smooth experience!

See you in the Arena,

The Clash Royale Team

entry.title: Rune Giant Balance Change and P.E.K.K.A Evolution Fix!
entry.content:
During the maintenance on January 30, we introduced a couple of balance changes, including a change to how Rune Giant interacts with different Troops and a correction to P.E.K.K.A Evolution.

Rune Giant

Rune Giant's enchantment now works differently when interacting with some Cards.

The Cards affected are Hunter, Ram Rider, Goblin Machine, Firecracker, Firecracker Evolution, Goblin Giant, and Goblin Giant Evolution.

The enchantment's damage bonus is now divided among projectiles, preventing Firecracker and Hunter from obliterating your Troops.

Additionally, attached Troops will no longer receive a damage bonus. This change affects Ram Rider's Rider, Goblin Machine's Rocket, and Goblin Giant's Spear Goblins.

P.E.K.K.A Evolution

The Heal per death values for P.E.K.K.A Evolution have been corrected.

The healing level now aligns with the announcement from the previous balance change.

Healing Values at Level 11:

  • Small Troops (<990 HP): 282 ‚Üí 142 (-50%)

  • Medium Troops (991-1989 HP): 282 ‚Üí 282 (0%)

  • Large Troops (>1990 HP): 282 ‚Üí 565 (100%)

See you in the Arena,

The Clash Royale Team

entry.title: Lumber Love Season!
entry.content:
New Card & Evolution

New Card:

Berserker!

Berserker is the newest 2-Elixir melee troop! She may look tiny and innocent, but her Hit Speed is one of the fastest in the game. It's surprising how often she needs her axes sharpened‚Äîbut then again, if you enjoyed hitting things as fast as she does, so would you!

Most other 2-Elixir Troops are swarms, like Bats or Goblins. Unlike them, Berserker fights alone. She has higher Hit Points and cannot be immediately destroyed by most Spells but sacrifices a significant amount of Damage Per Second for her durability. Because of this, she struggles in one-on-one fights against other melee Troops.

New Evolution:

Lumberjack!

Our second Legendary Evolution!

The Lumberjack always drops his precious bottle of unfiltered Rage when destroyed. With Evolution, he returns as an invisible Ghost, seeking vengeance‚Äîso long as he remains under Rage effect.

Lumberjack Evolution is a fast-attacking card, especially dangerous against Towers. However, he can be distracted and lured away from his Rage by other Troops and Buildings. Lumberghost is also vulnerable to certain Spells that can pull him out of his purple pool.

Only one question comes to mind when Lumberjack Ghost haunts the Arena‚Ä¶ Who you gonna call?

Events & Challenges

Super Touchdown (1v1): February 3 - 10

Ready for the big game? Blitz your opponent in Super Touchdown! 74, 52, 38, hut hut hut!

‚öîÔ∏è Challenge: February 7 - 10

üèÜ Reward: Banner Decoration

Power of Love (1v1, 2v2): February 10 - 17

The Power of Love makes anyone irresistible, making Troops fight for the opposite team!

‚öîÔ∏è Challenge: February 14 - 17

üèÜ Reward: Banner Frame

Runic Rampage (1v1): February 17 - 24

Unleash the fast and furious Berserker and Rune Giant combo!

‚öîÔ∏è Challenge: February 21 - 24

üèÜ Reward: Banner Decoration

Lumberjack Evolution Draft (1v1): February 24 - March 3

Cower in fear, Lumberjack's Evolution is here. Even when destroyed, Lumberjack's Rage lives on - just try and stop him!

‚öîÔ∏è Challenge: February 28 - March 3

üèÜ Reward: Banner Frame

Game Modes

2v2 Ladder is back!

From February 10 to 24, team up with a friend or a randomly assigned teammate to climb the ladder.

2v2 is all about teamwork, skill, and the luck of the draw‚Äîwill your teammate rise to the challenge, or will they chill and hope you'll carry them to glory?

Other Changes

Pass Royale: The 100 Crowns boost from the Diamond Pass has been removed.

See you in the Arena,

The Clash Royale Team

entry.title: February Balance Changes
entry.content:
NERFS ‚¨áÔ∏è

Dart Goblin

Ranged Damage

142 ‚Üí 135 (-5%)

We‚Äôre partially reverting Dart Goblin‚Äôs damage buff from last June to balance Spell bait decks. Even with reduced damage, Dart Goblin will still destroy Spear Goblins in a single attack.

Goblinstein

Monster Hitpoints

2598 ‚Üí 2393 (-8%)

Doctor already received a much-needed balance update last month, and now it's Monster's turn!

P.E.K.K.A

Range

1.6 tiles ‚Üí 1.2 tiles (-25%)

Early last year, we increased P.E.K.K.A‚Äôs Range to improve her then-underwhelming performance. Soon after, we released several other cards‚Äîsuch as Wizard Evolution, Battle Ram Evolution, Goblin Giant Evolution, a stronger Ram Rider, Goblinstein, and Royal Chef‚Äîall of which increased the impact of her buff, making her a very strong card in the right deck.

And while we're satisfied with P.E.K.K.A Evolution and most of her stats, we're now reverting her Range buff to better fit the overall game balance.

Lava Hound

Lava Pups Damage

90 ‚Üí 84 (-7%)

Lava Hound and Goblin Giant Evolution have benefitted the most from the introduction of Royal Chef. Since they have a synergistic Tower Troop, we need to balance them accordingly.

Goblin Giant Evolution

Goblin Spawn Speed

1.5s ‚Üí 1.8s (20%)

Royal Chef

Cooking Time: 18-30s ‚Üí 24-40s (33%)

Hit Speed: 0.9s ‚Üí 1s (11%)

Buff Threshold: 20% ‚Üí 33%

When a Tower is destroyed, Royal Chef will cook slower.

Royal Chef's pancakes are incredibly impactful, so we've made several design changes to reduce the total number of pancakes cooked. Firstly, we‚Äôre increasing his Cooking Time. Additionally, we‚Äôre making him cook slower when one Tower is destroyed, as previously players were prompted to sacrifice a Tower for a stronger offensive push.

We‚Äôre also raising his Hit Speed to reduce his defensive impact, which was too similar to Tower Princess, ensuring he remains primarily an offensive Tower Troop.

However, we're also increasing the Buff Threshold (the minimum % of Hitpoints required for the buff), preventing Royal Chef from wasting pancakes on Troops that are about to be destroyed.

BUFFS ‚¨Ü

Fire Spirit

Range

2 ‚Üí 2.5 (25%)

Fire Spirit has been lagging behind Ice Spirit and Electro Spirit. We're increasing its Range to buff it and maintain consistency with other Spirits.

This change also affects Furnace.

Musketeer

First Hit Speed

0.8s ‚Üí 0.7s (-13%)

Musketeer was outshined by other ranged Troops, so we're slightly buffing her long First Hit Speed.

This change also affects Three Musketeers.

Giant Snowball Evolution

Roll Distance

4 tiles ‚Üí 4.5 tiles (13%)

Giant Snowball Evolution's unique and technical ability wasn't impactful enough to compete with other Evolutions. We're increasing its Roll Distance to make it a more attractive pick.

BUG FIXES

  • Fixed an issue where Lumberjack Evolution could be instantly destroyed by certain Spells.

  • Fixed an issue where enemy Lumberjack Evolution would play the incorrect deploy sound.

  • Fixed an issue where Berserker would play incorrect sounds when she had a Star Level.

That‚Äôs all for now!

If you like these changes or feel there's still room for improvement, please let us know. We value your feedback and would love to hear from you on social media, Reddit, and Discord!

See you in the Arena,

The Clash Royale Team

entry.title: How Am I Supposed to Live Without You (Official Music Video)
Balance Changes & 2v2 Ladder Bug Fix
entry.content:
Balance Changes

Berserker

Hit Speed¬†

0.6sec ‚Üí 0.5sec

Damage Per Second

+20%

Berserker ended up weaker than we had hoped, so we‚Äôre increasing her Hit Speed by 0.1 seconds. This change will boost her Damage Per Second and make her a stronger competitor in the Arena.

Lumberjack Evolution

Lumberjack Ghost‚Äôs life cannot be extended by Rage Spell.

We‚Äôve received a lot of feedback on how strong the Lumberjack Evolution and Rage Spell combination was in high-Trophy Arenas and on the Path of Legends. It was much stronger than we expected.

To prevent this from becoming a bigger issue, especially in the 2v2 Ladder‚Äîwhere two players could coordinate their Spells and extend the Ghost‚Äôs lifespan indefinitely‚Äîwe have decided to remove this interaction. From now on, Lumberjack Ghost‚Äôs lifespan can no longer be extended by Rage Spell.

2v2 Ladder

We‚Äôve fixed an issue where reward Chest types were not refreshing after each game, causing players to receive the same type of Chest repeatedly.

With this issue resolved, you will be able to continue your progress from where you left off once the 2v2 Ladder is back online, and if you have received an incorrect Badge‚Äîwe will update it after the Ladder ends. To compensate for the downtime, we are extending the 2v2 Ladder run until February 25th.

See you in the Arena,

The Clash Royale Team
